name: Dark Lodash Docs
description:
This is a dark theme for the Lodash.com documentation.  

**Note: this has only been tested on Chrome (57.0)
additional_info:
Included modifications:
  • Darkened Color Palette
  • Search bar now sticks to top of term list
  • Text size reduced
  • Code example blocks have a margin, rather than a full page span for easier definition differentiation
  • When hovering over a function, a blue bar appears to the left which helps to maintain the focus scope of the target function
